Ace.name: Ace
Ace.description: Thrown gagdet that deploys hydraulic pressure pellets to breach breakable and reinforced surfaces

Amaru.name: Amaru
Amaru.description: A high-tensile grappling gun used for fast access to rappel points and open hatches, or to enter via exterior windows at limited distances

Ash.name: Ash
Ash.description: Fires an explosive Breach Round that burrows into a surface and automatically detonates

Blackbeard.name: Blackbeard
Blackbeard.description: Deploys a ballistic shield on his rifle that can be swapped if the first one gets damaged

Blitz.name: Blitz
Blitz.description: Triggers the flash attatched to his ballistic shield to temporarily blind enemies

Buck.name: Buck
Buck.description: Toggles under-barrel shotgun attachment on his main weapon

Capitao.name: Capitao
Capitao.description: Tactical crossbow that firres asphyxiating bolts and micro smoke grenades

Dokkaebi.name: Dokkaebi
Dokkaebi.description: Uploads a virus that forces enemy phones to emit a low buzz that can be overheard, thereby potentially compromising an enemy's position

Finka.name: Finka
Finka.description: The nanobots give the team a brief gain in HP and revive allies in a DBNO state

Fuze.name: Fuze
Fuze.description: Uses Cluster Charges that pierce and stick to walls, releasing sub-grenades on the opposing side

Glaz.name: Glaz
Glaz.description: Toggles a magnofication scope with sophisticated image sensors outlining long range marks, even through smoke

Gridlock.name: Gridlock
Gridlock.description: Thrown gadget that deploys barbed mats capable of slowing down and hurting enemies who traverse them

Hibana.name: Hibana
Hibana.description: A 40mm grenade launcher firing explosive pellets that can be detonated from a distance

Iana.name: Iana
Iana.description: Deploys a remote-controlled holographic copy of Iana to fool opponents and gather intel

Jackal.name: Jackal
Jackal.description: Tracking optics that locates targets by revealing and identifiying recent footsteps

Kali.name: Kali
Kali.description: An under-barrel mechanical projectile that explodes within a set radius to destroy gadgets on both sides of breakable and reinforced surfaces

Lion.name: Lion
Lion.description: The EE-ONE-D detects enemy movement, tagging their position during the scan

Maverick.name: Maverick
Maverick.description: Blowtorch capable of burning holes through reinforced walls at an almost inaudable level

Montange.name: Montange
Montange.description: can extend his Extendable Shield to offer full protection while standing

Nokk.name: Nokk
Nokk.description: Counter-intel that wipes Nokk's image from observation tools and reduces her noise, with exceptions

Nomad.name: Nomad
Nomad.description: Rifle attachment shooting an adhesive repulsion device that detonates by proximity

Sledge.name: Sledge
Sledge.description: Uses a Breaching Hammer to breach through destructable surfaces

Thatcher.name: Thatcher
Thatcher.description: Uses EMP Grenades to disable any electronics in range

Thermite.name: Thermite
Thermite.description: Sets an exothermic charge that destroys reinforced walls

Twitch.name: Twitch
Twitch.description: Uses two Shock Drones to disable traps or injure enemies. Deploys the first Shock Drone during the preparation phase

Ying.name: Ying
Ying.description: Cluster of flash charges that can either be anchored to surfaces or rolled out as a grenade

Zero.name: Zero
Zero.description: Launcher that deploys cameras which can pierce through breakable and reinforced surfaces to surveil either side and shoot a laser.

Zofia.name: Zofia
Zofia.description: Double barrel launcher that can fire both concussion and impact grenades

Alibi.name: Alibi
Alibi.description: Deploys holograms of Alibi and tags hostiles when fired upon

Bandit.name: Bandit
Bandit.description: Sets up a Crude Electrical Device that eelectrifies other gadgets and damages anything that comes within contact

Castle.name: Castle
Castle.description: Sets bulletproof barricades that are more resistant than standard ones

Caviera.name: Caviera
Caviera.description: Caviera's predatory stealth, the 'Silent Step,' allows her to lurk on her prey, almost inaudible, until it's too late

Clash.name: Clash
Clash.description: Extendable electro shield capable of slowing down enemies, causing damage over time

Doc.name: Doc
Doc.description: Fires a hypodermic shot to revive himself or teammates from a distance. Can also provide a temporary boost

Echo.name: Echo
Echo.description: Hovering drone that releases disorienting sonic bursts. Yokai also transmits a video feed to the Operator

Ela.name: Ela
Ela.description: Concussion proximity mines that can be anchored on surfaces, impairing hearing and causeing a dizzying effect

Frost.name: Frost
Frost.description: Uses a mechanical trap to incapacitate enemies

Goyo.name: Goyo
Goyo.description: Incendiary bomb that explodes when destroyed, attached to deployable shield

Jager.name: Jager
Jager.description: Uses and Active Defense system to intercept grenades before they detonate

Kaid.name: Kaid
Kaid.description: Electrifies reinforced walls and hatches, barbed wire, and deployable shields in its effective area

Kapkan.name: Kapkan
Kapkan.description: Sets booby traps on windows and door frames

Lesion.name: Lesion
Lesion.description: Cloaked toxic mines that inject a compound, injuring opponents and limiting their speed

Maestro.name: Maestro
Maestro.description: A remote controlled bulletproof camera armed with a high-energy laser

Melusi.name: Melusi
Melusi.description: Deployable bulletproof gadget which emits sound to slow down opponents in range

Mira.name: Mira
Mira.description: Deploys a one-way bulletproof mirrir on breakable and reinforced walls. Can also be ejected to create a murder hole

Mozzie.name: Mozzie
Mozzie.description: Launches autonomous bots that latch onto nearby enemy drones, hijacking their controls

Mute.name: Mute
Mute.description: Jams communications for remotely detonated gadgets or drones in its range

Oryx.name: Oryx
Oryx.description: Fast dash that allows for faster roaming, breaches, breakable walls, and pushes back opponents

Pulse.name: Pulse
Pulse.description: Detects heartbeats at a short distance through obstacles

Rook.name: Rook
Rook.description: Drops a supply bag full of armor plates for his teammates to use

Smoke.name: Smoke
Smoke.description: Sets remote detonated toxic gas charges

Tachanka.name: Tachanka
Tachanka.description: Deploys a Mounted LMG with a ballistic shield protecting the head from frontal shots

Valkyrie.name: Valkyrie
Valkyrie.description: Can set up 'Black Eye' cameras, feed accessible by while team via observation tools

Vigil.name: Vigil
Vigil.description: Vigil scans surrounding devices to wipe his image from cameras and drones

Wamai.name: Wamai
Wamai.description: Thrown adhesive gadget that affects and captures an opponent's projectile, and then self-destructs to detonate it.

Warden.name: Warden
Warden.description: Eyewear that improves visibility in smoke while standing still. Can also be activated to protect against or reduce flash blindness
